class.name: ndi
class.brief_description: Contains NumDot functions returning 64-bit signed integers.
class.description: All mathematical functions in this namespace return 64-bit signed integers. If you're planning to use the result of reductions in further tensor computations, use [nd] instead. Using this namespace may unintentionally promote the prevalent data type of computations.

method.name: count_nonzero
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.count_nonzero] that returns an int.

method.name: max
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.max] that returns an int.

method.name: median
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.median] that returns an int.

method.name: min
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.min] that returns an int.

method.name: norm
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.norm] that returns an int.

method.name: prod
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.prod] that returns an int.

method.name: sum_product
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.sum_product] that returns an int.

method.name: sum
method.description: No-axis equivalent of [method nd.sum] that returns an int.

method.name: trace
method.description: 2-D only equivalent of [method nd.trace] that returns an int.
